News.Title: International Conveyors Acquires Ganesha Ecosphere for Rs 11.28 Crore
News.Summary: International Conveyors Limited has acquired 121,540 equity shares of Ganesha Ecosphere Ltd, a leading rPET fiber manufacturer with turnover of Rs 1,465.54 crore, for Rs 11.28 crore in cash consideration. The acquisition is for investment purposes and involves a company that has been manufacturing rPET fiber and yarn from PET bottle scrap since 1987.

News.Title: International Conveyors Receives NSE Approval for ESOP Listing of 33.75 Lakh Equity Shares
News.Summary: International Conveyors Limited received in-principle approval from NSE to list up to 33,75,000 equity shares of Re. 1/- each under its ICL Employee Stock Option Plan 2020. The approval is subject to fulfilling various listing conditions including statutory approvals, compliance with SEBI regulations, and submission of required documentation after allotment.

News.Title: International Conveyors Limited Reports Quarterly Financial Results for September 2025
News.Summary: International Conveyors Limited announced unaudited standalone and consolidated financial results for the quarter and half-year ended September 30, 2025, following board approval on November 13, 2025. The company's consolidated results show revenue from operations of Rs. 3,536 lakhs for the quarter with a profit after tax of Rs. 520 lakhs, while standalone operations reported revenue of Rs. 3,966 lakhs with a loss after tax of Rs. 876 lakhs.

News.Title: Elpro International Acquires 2,144 Additional Shares in International Conveyors Through Open Market
News.Summary: Elpro International Limited purchased 2,144 equity shares of International Conveyors Limited through open market transactions on September 22, 2025. The acquisition increased Elpro's holding from 9,30,315 shares to 9,32,459 shares, though its percentage ownership remained at 1.47%. The promoter group's total holding stayed unchanged at 70.07% of International Conveyors' total equity capital of 6,33,79,000 shares. The transaction was disclosed under SEBI regulations for substantial acquisition of shares and takeovers.

News.Title: Elpro International Acquires 2,144 Shares of International Conveyors Through Open Market
News.Summary: Elpro International Limited acquired 2,144 equity shares of International Conveyors Limited through open market transactions on September 22, 2025. News.Title: Elpro International Limited Acquires Additional Shares in International Conveyors Limited

News.Title: International Conveyors Limited Reports Strong Q1 Results, Schedules 52nd AGM for September
News.Summary: International Conveyors Limited's Board approved unaudited financial results for the quarter ended June 30, 2025. The company reported standalone revenue from operations of Rs. 3,353 lakhs and profit after tax of Rs. 5,221 lakhs, with earnings per share of Rs. 8.24. On a consolidated basis, revenue was Rs. 3,546 lakhs with profit after tax of Rs. 5,207 lakhs. The Board appointed M/s Rajesh Kumar Shaw & Co. as secretarial auditor for five consecutive years starting April 1, 2025, subject to shareholder approval. The 52nd Annual General Meeting is scheduled for September 24, 2025, at the company's registered office. The Board also approved exploring inorganic expansion through acquisition of assets, lands or targets in Maharashtra region for cash consideration. Register of members will remain closed from September 18-24, 2025, with cut-off date for voting rights set as September 17, 2025.

News.Title: International Conveyors Reports Strong Q4 Financial Results
News.Summary: International Conveyors Limited has announced its Q4 financial results, showing significant year-over-year and quarter-over-quarter growth. The company's consolidated net profit increased to 130 million rupees, up from 61 million rupees in the same quarter last year and 200 million rupees in the previous quarter. Revenue also saw a substantial rise, reaching 546 million rupees compared to 260 million rupees in the year-ago period.
